errors.popup-closed: Oops! We couldn't log you in because the popup was closed. Let's try again!
errors.token-expired: Your authentication token is expired. Please log-in again.
errors.insufficient-authorization: You do not have the required authorizations to use this application. Please log out and use a different account.
errors.unknown: Oops! An unexpected error occurred during the log in. Let's try again!
errors.missing-token: The URL you are trying to access is invalid.

errors.create-inspection: An unexpected error occurred while creating the inspection.
errors.missing-inspection-id: The URL you are trying to access is invalid.

inspection-complete.thank-message: Thank you for taking the time to complete the inspection.
